channel.title: MemoryForensics on Rithvik
channel.description: Recent content in MemoryForensics on Rithvik

item.title: TRUST ISSUES [200]
item.description: Solved by: ABhishek Bharadwaj, Rithvik Challenge Description Source Solution so we were basically given with a memorydump and pdf. PDF Analysis Since we got a pdf, We tried all type of stego tools and ended with binwalk binwalk -e confidential.pdf We got a vhd - virtual hard disk from binwalk.. So let us analyse that. Here we found header and replaced it with head and got the vhd. But it was bitlocker encrypted.
